2867:17: none“> virāgānna paraṃ pāpaṃ na puṇyaṃ sukhataḥ param
2867:22: none“> ato'kṣarasukhe cittaṃ niveśyaṃ tu sadā nṛpa ||
2867:48: none“> vigrahe yaḥ parihāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet |
2867:60: none“> nānyayā bhāṣayā mlecchaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ yathā
2867:65: none“> na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā ||
2867:97: none“> na śivo nāpi śaktiśca ratnāntargatasaṃsthitam
2867:109: none“> ekāraḥ pṛthivī jñeyā karmamudrā tu locanā |
2867:131: none“> tattvaṃ vai ye na jānanti sarve te niṣphalāya
2867:154: none“> yaḥ pratyayādhīna sa śūny uktaḥ
2867:207: none“> pañcamaṃ svādhipenaiva nāmasekaṃ tu ṣaṣṭhamam |
2867:211: none“> buddhājñā saptamaṃ sekaṃ kalaśaṃ sekamaṣṭamam||
2867:224: none“> vyākaroti svaya śāstā eṣa sekavidhiṃ svayam |
2867:228: none“> ācāryo nāvamantavyaḥ sugatājñāṃ na laṅghayet||
2867:247: none“> ṣaḍaṅgaṃ bhāvayet tasmāt svādhiṣṭhānasamaṃ punaḥ
2867:276: none“> sā hi buddhasya dharmasya saṃghasyāpi hi deśanā
2867:313: none“> atha sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ - kathaṃ tvaṃ
2867:320: sarvatathāgatā ājñāpa [ yatha ] kathaṃ pratipadyāmīdṛśaṃ tattvamiti |
2867:330: none“> mahāvodhisattva āha- ā jñāto bhagavantaḥ
2867:364: none“> yogīndraiḥ sevanīyā paramajinasutaiḥ sevitā yā
2867:369: none“> sā jñānārciḥ pravṛddhā dahati saviṣayaṃ māravṛndaṃ
2867:374: none“> rāgādiṃ cāpi kāye dahati samasukhaṃ yogināṃ varṣayogāt
2867:386: none“> bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥśaṅkā ca
2867:391: none“> vicikitsā na kartavyā tasyedaṃ siddhayati
2867:491: none“> so'haṃ herukamūrtireṣu bhagavān yo na
2867:496: none“> śrīpadmaṃ madanaṃ ca gokudahanaṃ kurvan yathā
2867:524: none“> tatra svānubhavo hi yasya sa punaḥ siddho
2867:542: none“> ete pañca yanti mohataṭino pāram |
2867:560: none“> saṃsāre bahu saṃsaranti sudhiyo tena prabhāveṇa
2867:565: none“> bhāvābhāvayuge vicārya sakalaṃ svaprajñayā saṃsthitam
2867:575: none“> grāhyagrāhakavarjitaṃ hi mudibhirduḥkhairyathā [ sa ] ntatam ||
2867:586: none“> akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca |
2867:590: none“> yadi niḥsvabhāvābhāvaḥ svabhāvato na vidyante
2867:598: none“> cittamātramidaṃ sarvamiti yā deśanā muneḥ |
2867:602: none“> uttrāsaparihārārthaṃ bālānāṃ sā na tattvataḥ ||
2867:635: none“> ratnapuramidaṃ devi kiñjalke jvalatāṃ vrajet |
2867:639: none“> rudro yugmaḥ śivaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śaktiḥ saiva
2867:652: none“> na santi tattvato bhāvāḥ śaktirūpeṇa bhāvitāḥ |
2867:667: none“> nāsti rātrau na sandhyāyāṃ divāpi ca na vidyate
2867:672: none“> bho taṃ sahajamānandaṃ gurucaraṇeṣu pṛccha ||
2867:684: none“> rbhāgineyā śrotrameva ca jananī bhaṇyate ghrāṇam
2867:689: none“> rasanā duhitā tathā mano bhaved bhāryā
2867:707: none“> varaṃ jetavane ramye śṛgālatvaṃ vrajāmyaham |
2867:711: none“> na tu vaiśeṣikaṃ mokṣaṃ gotamāgantumarhati ||
2867:762: none“> om svabhāvaśuddhe āhara āhara āgaccha āgaccha
2867:780: none“> “ yoginyaḥ sahajasiddhāḥ “ iti vacanāt tā evāha -
2867:784: none“> śirasastu samudbhūtā nāḍayaḥ śirasijāḥ smṛtāḥ
2867:796: none“> rocate dīyate yattad mahāvairocano muniḥ |
2867:808: none“> yathā stambhena mahatā ghriyate līlayā gṛham |
2867:812: none“> na ca dvārastathā kāyaḥ kaṅkālaireva dhāryate
2867:839: none“> siddhayanti sarvamantrā vai sakṛduccārite'pi hi
2867:844: none“> anena stotrarājñā vai toṣitāste tathāgatāḥ |
2867:848: none“> dadanti vipulāṃ siddhiṃ kalpasthāṃ kalpacoditām
2867:861: none“> amitābhaṃ jinaṃ śuddhamamogharājaṃ ca sarvataḥ
2867:866: none“> rasaṃ rasāyanaṃ tattvaṃ pravadanti varāṇi ca ||
2867:870: none“> aśeṣāḥ siddhayo ramyā vipulā arthasampadaḥ |
2867:878: none“> jñānamāyurbalaṃ vegaṃ dadanti paramaṃ śubham ||
2867:912: none“> na tasya sattvatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā
2867:921: none“> na tasya jñānatā naśyennirmalatvena yā sthitā
2867:933: none“> skandhā eva hi sambuddhā boddhayarthaṃ
2867:953: none“> āgneye caiva vāyavye māhendre vāruṇe tathā |
2867:962: none“> tāsāṃ madhye svadaivatyaṃ turyayogaḥ parasparam
2867:982: none“> tasya vajradharasyeha siddhiḥ karatale sthitā |
2867:1012: none“> kaṅkālo daṇḍarūpe yo'sau herukaḥ paramāśrayaḥ |
2867:1024: none“> āgneye caiva vāyavye māhendre vāruṇe tathā |
2867:1061: none“> na yogaḥ pratibimbeṣu niṣiktādiṣu jāyate |
2867:1077: none“> enaṃ paśyanti saṃyuktaṃ sarvathā pūjayanti ye |
2867:1081: none“> dṛṣṭāstaiḥ pūjitāścaiva sarvabuddhā bhavanti hi
2867:1111: none“> nāryo'pi hi vimucyante buddhabodhiṃ spṛśanti
2867:1116: none“> sarvatra sarvataḥ sarva sarvathā sarvadā svayam
2867:1149: none“> sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya tadanye vidhayaḥ smṛtāḥ
2867:1154: none“> anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvaḥ paraṃ yataḥ |
2867:1158: none“> subhageti ca vikhyāto susthito buddhamudrayā ||
2867:1223: none“> āliṅgati jhaṭityeṣā vṛṣasyantī ca śūnyatā ||
2867:1267: none“> mayoktaṃ kiṃ punastatra yogī duḥkhaṃ samīhate
2867:1276: none“> ādhāre cyuti āpannaṃ ādheyasya virāgatā||
